title: Resources to learn optimization on manifolds

yaml.title: Resources to learn optimization on manifolds

markdown.markdown:
The documentation on this website is meant to help users get to grips with Manopt. Underneath the software, there is a fair amount of math. This page provides some pointers to learn that theory. The following books (both available online for free) can be helpful to learn the relevant mathematics: ::: {layout-ncol=2} ![An introduction to optimization on smooth manifolds](images/BoumalIntroSmoothManifoldsCover.png){.preview-image} [An introduction to optimization on smooth manifolds](https://www.nicolasboumal.net/book)
Nicolas Boumal, Cambridge University Press, 2023. ![Optimization algorithms on matrix manifolds](images/AbsilOptimizationMatrixManifoldsCover.jpg) [Optimization algorithms on matrix manifolds](https://press.princeton.edu/absil)
Pierre-Antoine Absil, Robert Mahony and Rodolphe Sepulchre, Princeton University Press, 2008. ::: ### A full course * [MATH-512 at EPFL](https://www.nicolasboumal.net/book/#lectures): this is a full set of **video lectures**, slides and exercises (with hints and solutions). * [edX course](https://www.edx.org/learn/math/ecole-polytechnique-federale-de-lausanne-introduction-to-optimization-on-smooth-manifolds-first-order-methods): this covers the first six weeks of MATH-512, on the edX platform. ### Tutorial videos * This [one-hour video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UjaoZE0GBpg&ab_channel=SimonsInstitute) and this [two-hour video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lK62DwSIjXA&t=6s&ab_channel=FMGDataDrivenControlSummerSchool) introduce the basics of differential geometry and Riemannian geometry for optimization on smooth manifolds. They cover more or less the same contents. The [slides](https://www.nicolasboumal.net/SIAMOP2023/) were augmented for a 3-hour tutorial at the SIAM Conference on Optimization in 2023 (video not available). * Week 5 of MATH-512 includes a lecture about Manopt: [the basics](https://mediaspace.epfl.ch/media/0_g5gfi47b) and [a bit more](https://mediaspace.epfl.ch/media/0_3a1jnw74). ### Blogs and blog posts * The [Race to the bottom](https://www.racetothebottom.xyz) blog about nonconvex optimization features some Riemannian optimization. * This [blog post](https://afonsobandeira.wordpress.com/2015/03/16/optimizing-in-smooth-waters-optimization-on-manifolds/) gives an informal overview of optimization on manifolds. ### Code examples * See the [examples](https://github.com/NicolasBoumal/manopt/tree/master/examples) that ship with Manopt.
